title: Deep research assistant with Perplexity AI and Telegram citations
description:
**Turn your Telegram bot into a real-time research assistant** with this intelligent n8n workflow. Designed for founders, analysts, and knowledge workers, this automation uses Perplexity Sonar and Sonar Pro to deliver **concise, citation-rich answers** to complex queries ‚Äî directly inside Telegram.

---

**üîç What It Does**
- **‚úÖ Smart Query Routing**  
  Automatically selects the right tool based on query complexity ‚Äî Sonar for fast lookups, Sonar Pro for multi-source synthesis.

- **üìö Cited Research Summaries**  
  Includes clickable URLs from Perplexity‚Äôs source data for transparency and auditability.

- **üß† Session Memory**  
  Maintains chat context using Telegram chat ID for follow-up questions and threaded insight.

- **üîê Secure Access Filter**  
  Restricts bot usage to authorized Telegram users.

- **‚öôÔ∏è Customizable Agent Behavior**  
  Easily adjust tone, tool preferences, and citation style via system message.

---

**üöÄ Use Cases**
- Market research & competitor analysis  
- Academic and scientific deep-dives  
- Legal and transcript summarization  
- Podcast, video, and trend monitoring  
- Personal AI assistant for founders and consultants

---

**üõ† Setup Instructions**
1. Create a Telegram bot via [@BotFather](https://t.me/BotFather) and add your token.  
2. Add your OpenAI and Perplexity API keys.  
3. Update the filter node with your Telegram user ID.  
4. Deploy and start chatting ‚Äî responses appear in Telegram.
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
